comments.body: We should remove `const` in this file, right?
That file doesn't use flutter_test, so no.

You should also add a scale test similar to [this paintImage scale test](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/pull/54258/files#diff-42ee30850dae3103f2cfc1e4a715532aR420). The test in particular tests `paintImage`, but you can combine elements from [this BoxDecoration test](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/pull/54258/files#diff-42ee30850dae3103f2cfc1e4a715532aR223) with the scale test for `paintImage` to achieve the outcome you need.
